short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stimulate your working habits with motivating wallpapers - Forestab is elegant and discrete, with a dose of classy and subtle

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Greetings, dear users!

We are proud to present you the Forest Tab extension for Google Chrome, the ultimate tool that will transform your new tab into a peaceful and tranquil forest scene. This add-on was designed to help you concentrate and be productive, surrounded by the beauty of nature.

With Forest Tab, you'll never have to open a bland, boring tab again. The forest backdrop will captivate you, and the time widget and search bar will keep you on task. But that's not all, we've also included a collection of thought-provoking inspirational quotes to keep you motivated and inspired throughout the day. These quotes have been carefully selected to provide you with daily motivation and positivity.

Whether you're a nature enthusiast or simply in need of a boost of inspiration, Forest Tab is the ideal addition to your Chrome browser. This add-on is more than just an aesthetic enhancement, it's a comprehensive browsing experience that combines functionality with motivation. Don't wait any longer, install Forest Tab today and enhance your browsing experience with the beauty of nature.
Please note that the use of the search feature within the new tab extension will be powered by Microsoft Bing. âŒ›

We are confident that you will find great value in this extension and make it an essential part of your browsing experience. However, we understand that it's not always a perfect fit for everyone. That's why, if for any reason, you find that this extension is not meeting your expectations, uninstalling it is a breeze. Simply follow the standard Chrome procedures for removing extensions, and it will be gone in a matter of seconds. (https://forestab.com/index.html#uninstall - in case you forgot the procedure)
